task.title: Making Pancakes in the Morning
task.shortdesc: First thing you should do when you wake up in the morning is get a good meal. There's several different things easy meals that you can fix waiting in the kitchen. Fix some pancakes for yourself.

step.cmd: Grab the mic in the cabinet to the far left on the side with the sink.
Grab a bowl from the cabinet on the opposite side from the cabinet
Gather measuring devices from the drawer
Follow the instructions stated on the box
Grab a cooking pan and set it on the stove.
Cook your pancakes and enjoy your early morning meal.
